DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the incidence of tachy- and bradyarrhythmic episodes in patients with acute myocardial infarction with depressed ventricular function and to determine the predictive value of several invasive and non-invasive risk markers for life-threatening arrhythmia
DOC.brief_title: CARISMA : Cardiac Arrhythmias and Risk Stratification After MyoCardial Infarction
DOC.criteria: Acute myocardial infarction (< 21 days) Ejection fraction <= 40 % or wall motion index <= 1.3 Implantable loop recorder can't be implanted within 3 weeks after MI NYHA class IV Planned or previous ICD implantation Planned CABG Severe valvular disease Pregnancy Life expectancy < 1 year for noncardiac cause
